titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Psi Upsilon Records, 1840 - 1972
titlestmt.author: Processed by: Emma Rothberg and Alison Rosenberg; machine-readable finding aid created by: Emma Rothberg and Alison Rosenberg

Machine-readable finding aid derived from XML authoring program.

titlepage.titleproper: Inventory of the Psi Upsilon Records, 1840 - 1972
titlepage.publisher:
Special Collections & Archives
Wesleyan University
Middletown, CT, USA

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Psi Upsilon Records1840 - 1972
did.physloc: For current information on the location of these materials, please consult Special Collections & Archives staff.
did.abstract: The Psi Upsilon records consist of materials related to Xi Chapter at Wesleyan University and include constitions, by-laws, minutes, programs, correspondence, invitations, clippings, publications, annals and chronicles, photographs, architectural drawings, and scrapbooks.

userestrict.head: Copyright Notice
userestrict.p: Copyright for official University records is held by Wesleyan University; all other copyright is retained by the authors of items in these papers, or their descendants, as stipulated by United States copyright law.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Psi Upsilon Records, Collection #1000-216, Special Collections & Archives, Wesleyan University, Middletown, CT, USA.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: Processed by Emma Rothberg and Alison Rosenberg, May, 2015
Encoded by Emma Rothberg, Alison Rosenberg, and Leith Johnson, May, 2015

scopecontent.head: Collection Overview
scopecontent.p: The Psi Upsilon records consist of materials related to Xi Chapter at Wesleyan University and include constitions, by-laws, minutes, programs, correspondence, invitations, clippings, publications, annals and chronicles, photographs, architectural drawings, and scrapbooks.

arrangement.head: Collection Arrangement

controlaccess.head: Online Catalog Headings
controlaccess.p: These and related materials may be found under the following headings in online catalogs.
controlaccess.subject: Greek letter societies.
